ssot__LoyaltyProgramMember__dlm.name: Loyalty Program Member
ssot__LoyaltyProgramMember__dlm.description: The Loyalty Program Member DMO represents a person who has joined a loyalty program.

ssot__AccountId__c.description: A reference ID to account of company that employs member.

ssot__AccountContactId__c.description: A reference ID to individual who has a role specific to account.

ssot__CanReceivePartnerPromotions__c.description: An indicator whether a member has opted-in to receive promotions from partners.

ssot__CanReceivePromotions__c.description: An indicator whether a member has opted-in to receive promotions.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date when the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__EnrollmentChannelId__c.description: A reference ID to methods that members can use to enroll in loyalty programs, for example via web, email, call center, social media, or point of sale.

ssot__EnrollmentDate__c.description: The date the member was admitted to loyalty program.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__LastActivityDate__c.description: The date of the most recent account activity.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__LastRenewalDate__c.description: The date when member last extended their membership in program.

ssot__LoyaltyMemberTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to types of loyalty members.

ssot__LoyaltyProgramId__c.description: A reference ID to marketing strategy designed to encourage customers to shop at or use the services of business associated with program.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Loyalty Program Member DMO.

ssot__LoyaltyProgramMemberStatusId__c.description: A reference ID to state of member's status in loyalty program.

ssot__LoyaltyStatementDeliveryTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to type of delivery method for loyalty statement, for example postal mail, email, or text message.

ssot__MembershipNumber__c.description: An alphanumeric ID visible to loyalty program members.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of loyalty program member.

ssot__PartyId__c.description: A reference ID to person who belongs to loyalty program.

ssot__ReferredByMemberId__c.description: A reference ID to person who referred member to loyalty program.

ssot__ReferredByPartyId__c.description: A reference ID to person who referred member to loyalty program.

ssot__RelatedCorporateProgramMemberId__c.description: A reference ID to corporate membership account associated with member.

ssot__StatementLastGeneratedDate__c.description: The date the member was last sent program statement.

ssot__StatementFrequencyTimeUOM__c.description: A reference ID to how often member has elected to receive program statements, for example monthly or yearly.
